“Bɩ y sak tɩ b sẽn togs yãmb goam nins rũndã wã pa y sũyã pʋsẽ. Rɩk-a n zãms f kambã neere.”—Tõodo 6:6, 7.
A Zeova sẽn yaa zak-lugendã ratame tɩ roagdbã ges b kambã yelle. (Kolos rãmba 3:20) Y sã n yaa roagda, bãng-y tɩ yãmb n tog n wub y kambã, n sõng biig fãa t’a wa lebg beoog biiga, n nong a Zeova. (2 Tɩmote 1:5; 3:15) Yaa bi-ribl tɩ yaa bi-pugl me, y tog n bao n bãnga sẽn be a sũurẽ wã. Yãmb mak-sõngã tõe n sõnga wʋsgo. La yaa y sã n deng n modg t’a Zeova goamã be y sũyẽ wã la y na n tõog n 
... 
r bal pa sek ye. Yaa tɩlae tɩ y tags neer n bãng b sẽn sɩd rat n yeelã. Kambã wae n zẽnda yɛlã, pa rẽ bɩ b yeel bũmb tɩ yaool n pa b sẽn tagsdã ye. “Ned sã n leok t’a nan ka wʋme, a yaa yalma.” (Yelbũna 18:13) Ra n yikd-y y sũur tao-tao ye.—Yelbũna 19:11.
Y SẼN TÕE N MAANE:
Baa biig sã n yeel bũmb sẽn yikd y sũuri, bɩ y yõk y menga.
Tags-y yãmb me sẽn da maand to-to y sẽn wa n yaa wa y biigã, la y sẽn da nong bũmb ninsã.

t’a tũ noyã. (Yelbũna 28:7) Sẽn paase, y tog n sõnga kambã tɩ b nong a Zeova Gomdã, la b bãng a noyã sõma. (Yɩɩl Sõamyã 1:2) Rẽ na n sõngame tɩ b sũyã pʋgẽ bɩ b mi sẽn yaa sõma ne wẽng n bake.—Hebre dãmba 5:14.
Y SẼN TÕE N MAANE:
Modg-y tɩ kambã bãng tɩ Wẽnnaam sɩd beeme, la tɩ b tõe n teeg-a lame.
Sõng-y kambã tɩ b tõe n bãng sẽn yaa wẽnga, la b sẽn tõe n gil rẽ to-to. Wala makre yel-yood nins sẽn be ẽntɛrnetã pʋgẽ wã. Wilg-y-b b sẽn tõe n maan to-to n zãag b mens ne sẽn tʋmd-b raglem ne kambã.

Tõnd na n kẽna a Zeova yʋʋr yĩng wakat fãa!
“Tõnd na n kẽna a Zeova tõnd Wẽnnaamã yʋʋr yĩng wakat sẽn pa yãk tɛka, n-ye wakat fãa.”—MIISE 4:5, NW.
1. Koe-bʋs n be Miise sak a 3 n tɩ ta a 5 pʋgẽ?
A ZEOVA tara koɛɛg n na n taas a nin-buiidã, la a tũnuga ne a no-rɛɛs a Miise n taas-ba. Wẽnnaam yãka raab sẽn ya a yik n zab ne wẽng maandbã. A na n sɩbga Israɛlle, a sẽn kɩɩsd sɩdã yĩnga. La zu-noogo, a Zeova na n ninga neb nins sẽn kẽnd a yʋʋr yĩngã barka. Koe-kãens yaa vẽenes a Miise bãngr-gomdã sak 
... 
la bãngr-gomd ning b sẽn gʋls Miise 3:12 pʋgẽ wã paam pidsgu, la rẽ segd n kɩtame tɩ d kɩs sɩd ne bõe?
14 Sɩd-sɩda, Zida pa tõe n põs a Zeova bʋ-kaoorã ye. Siõ na n ‘lebga wa pʋʋg sẽn tar kaalem’ tɩ pids bãngr-gomd ning sẽn be Miise 3:12 pʋgẽ wã. Tõnd mii rũndã-rũndã tɩ bõn-kãensã zĩnda sasa ning Babilon nebã sẽn wa n sãam Zida la Zerizalɛm yʋʋmd 607 sẽn deng Kirist zãmaanã. Yaa a Miise sẽn togs a bãngr-gomdã sẽn yɩɩd yʋʋm koabg poor la rẽnda zĩnd-yã. A Miise ra kɩsa sɩd tɩ ra yaa bũmb sẽn wate.
...
 ning sẽn pʋgdã na n sõnga tõnd tɩ d paam zãmsg sẽn yaa sõma sẽn yit a Miise bãngr-gomdã sẽn kengd tẽebã pʋgẽ.
Wãn to la y na n leoke?

Biiblã babg ning b sẽn gʋls ne gɛrkã pʋgẽ, b gomda a Barnabas ne tʋm-tʋmd a Poll yell wʋsgo. Yɩɩ yel-gɛtb sẽn da gilgd n kaagd tigimsã. Bõe yĩnga? Bala, b ra baooda b tẽed-n-taasã neer ne b sũy fãa. A Poll ra yeelame t’a ratame n “leb n kẽng n tɩ ges ba-biisã” n bãng b kibare. A sakame n na n tog soay n zãage, n tɩ keng b pelse. (Tʋʋma 15:36) Yaa woto me ne tõnd tigims sul la distrik yel-gɛtbã.
B wat n kengda tõnd raoodo. Tigims sull yel-gɛtã kaagda tigims sõor sẽn na ta 20. A kaagda tiging fãa 
... 
s sul sẽn na ta bãmb piig yelle. A kaagda tigimsã la a lʋɩt taoor n get rasem a yiib tigs-kãsengã yell yʋʋmd fãa. Nin-kãensã ne b pagbã minim tõe n nafa tõnd hal wʋsgo. B modgdame n bãngd tigimsã ned fãa sõma, n yãagd tõnd koɛɛgã mooneg pʋgẽ la d Biibl karen-biisã nengẽ. B tũuda kãsem-dãmbã n kaagd tigimsã neba. Tigissã la tigs-kãsemsã sasa, b sõssã d sẽn kelgdã kengda d raoodo.—Tʋʋma 15:35.
B rata tigimsã nebã fãa neere. Tigims sul la distrik yel-gɛtbã rata ne b sũy fãa tɩ tigimsã neb tẽeb tall
...
modgr ning tigingã sẽn maane, la b kõ-b sagls sẽn na n sõng-b b tʋʋmdã pʋgẽ. B sõngda so-pakdbã sẽn na yɩl tɩ b tʋm b tʋʋmdã neere. B sẽn paamd n bãngd nin-paalsã sẽn wat tigissã la modgr ning b sẽn maandã noom-b lame. Yel-gɛtb kãensã tʋmda ne yamleoogo, tɩ b ned kam fãa yaa d ‘tʋmd-n-taag’ sẽn tʋmd tõnd neer yĩnga. (2 Korẽnt dãmba 8:23) Bɩ d tall tẽeb la d yɩ wẽn-sakdb wa nin-kãensã.—Hebre dãmba 13:7.
Bõe yĩng tɩ tigims sul la distrik yel-gɛtbã kaagd tigimsã?
Wãn to la d tõe n dɩ b kaagrã nafa?

‘Yãmb maanda woto, . . . bɩ y kell n maan woto daar fãa n paase.’—1 TES. 4:1.
1, 2. a) Bõn-kãsems bʋs la neb nins sẽn vɩɩmd a Zezi wakatẽ wã paam n yã? b) Bõe yĩng tɩ d yetẽ tɩ tõnd sẽn vɩ wakat ningã me pa wõnd a taaba?
RẼ YĨNGA yãmb zoe n tagsame tɩ y sã n da zĩndẽ wakat ning a Zezi sẽn da gilgd n moond koɛɛgã, y sũur yɩta noog bɩ? Tõe tɩ y tagsda y sẽn da na n paamẽ t’a Zezi maag y bãas tɩ y paam y menga. Tõe me tɩ y tagsda y sũur sẽn da na n yɩ noog to-to
... 
la woto: “Bɩ y reng n bao Wẽnnaam soolem ne bãmb tɩrlem.” (Mat. 6:33) D sẽn ne tɩ Wẽnnaam nin-buiidã sʋka, kãsemb la kom-bɩɩs sɩd tũuda sagl-kãngã wã, kõta sũ-noog wʋsgo. Sɩd me, wʋsg yãka yam n bas yɛl kẽer sẽn da tõe n zɩlg b vɩɩmã, sẽn na yɩl n tõog n paam sẽk wʋsg n moond koɛɛgã. Sẽn maan-b woto wã sɩd bãngame tɩ f sã n deng n bao Wẽnnaam soolmã ne yẽesem, f paamda sũ-noogo, tɩ f sũur noom ne f vɩɩmã.

“Mam yãnda tʋʋmd ning Wẽnnaam sẽn kõ ninsaalbã tɩ b maanã. Wẽnnaam maana bũmb fãa sõama n zems a wakate. Bãmb ninga wakat sẽn ka sɛt tagsg ninsaal sũur pʋgẽ.”—Koɛɛg soaba 3:10, 11.
GOM-KÃENSÃ yaa rĩm a Salomo sẽn yɩ yam-soabã goama. B wilgda ninsaalbã tagsg sẽn yaa a soaba. B pa tõe n põs kũumã ye. Tõe tɩ yaa rẽ yĩng la b sẽn baood ne b sũur fãa n na n paam yõ-wokã. Na maan yʋʋm tusa, b baoo b sẽn tõe n maan n wogl b yõorã.
Wala makre, d gom a Gilgamesh sẽn yɩ Sumeri rãmbã rĩmã yelle. Soalem buu
... 
db kẽer tagsdame tɩ b bãnga bũmb ning sẽn kɩt tɩ d kʋʋndẽ wã. B yeelame tɩ selill nins b sẽn boond tɩ kormozom-dãmbã baasgẽ, bũmb n be be tɩ b boond tɩ telomeer-dãmba. Selill-dãmbã sã n wa weend taaba, yaa telomeer-dãmbã n kogend bũmb ning sẽn kɩtd tɩ b tõe n bãng biig sã n na n yɩɩ woko, zẽega, bedre, la bũmb a taaba. La selill-dãmbã sã n weend taaba, telomeer-dãmbã boogdame. La tarẽ-n-tarẽ, b pa le weend taab ye. Wakat kãng la kʋʋlmã sɩngda.

 loogame.” (Yɩɩn-sõamyã 90:10) Baa ninsaalbã sẽn modgd n na n wogl b yõorã, naoor wʋsgo, b pa kaoosd n yɩɩg a Moyiiz sẽn yeelã ye.
Bõn-vɩɩlɩ n yaool n be, n kaoosd n yɩɩd ninsaalbã. Wala makre, “oursin” wã la “mollusque.” B bee ko-kãsengã pʋgẽ, la b tõe n kaoosa yʋʋm 200 la zaka. Tɩɩg ning me b sẽn boond tɩ “séquoia géant” wã tõe n vɩɩmda yʋʋm tusa. A Freda Akosua Oheneafrewo Prempeh (roga yʋʋmd 1966 yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug rasm 23 wakat)
Yʋʋmd 2017 wã, b yãka a t'a yɩ sull ning sẽn get tẽn-tẽnga siglg wɛɛngẽ wã taoor soaba.
A roga yʋʋmd 1966 yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug rasem 23 yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug rasem a 2 Akra, Ghana na-zakẽ. A yaa Ohenenana Akwasi Agyeman Dua-Prempeh, sẽn yaa Ashanti dĩm-dibli wã bi-pugl a tãab soaba, la Nana Amma Serwaa, sẽn yaa Kontihemaa sẽn yit Duayaw Nkwanta, ((b sẽn boond tɩ Madame Georgina Ansah).
A Freda sɩnga a karẽn-doogã karẽn-doogã
... 
Marketing, fãa sẽn yit Chartered Institute of Marketing, United Kingdom. A paama a karẽn-biiga (Business Administration), Human Resource Management Option Ghana inivɛrsite wã yʋʋmd 2006 pʋgẽ.[1] A leb n zãmsa MA Comms, Media la Public Relations a Leicester University, UK la a leb n tara PhD ne Ghana Technology University College.[2][3]
A Freda Akosua Prempeh yita Duayaw Nkwanta sẽn yaa a tẽnga taoor lʋɩtb sull ning sẽn get tẽnga yel-gɛtbã yellã, Tano North, Aafo soolmẽ wã, Ghana. A yaa kiris-ned
...
sgu.

1Na'ayenɛ, mam boe la be'em teŋa teŋa ha, ge kaaha bɔ'ɔra hom na. 2Na'ayenɛ, wom n kaahega wa, kelehe mam kaahere ɛɛra ho ninbɔn'zɔrɛ wa. 3Hom Na'ayenɛ han golehere ne la be'em biŋera, n Daana, ane n wan ze'ele ne? 4Ge hom bahɛ be'em mɛ. Mudiyettu yaa karẽn-bi-kãseng sẽn yaa karẽnsa la tãnsãb sẽn yit Kerala. Yaa b sẽn boond tɩ Bhagavathi bɩ Bhadrakali wã tũudum pʋgẽ. B yɩɩla b sẽn boond tɩ bãdrakali wẽnd-doogẽ wã, la b maand-a-la yʋʋm-yaoolem kiuugã n tãag zĩ-noy kiuugã.
Yʋʋmd 2010 soabã, a Mudiyettu paama UNESCO sẽn yã tɩ b gʋlsd a soab nin-buiidã nin-buiidã sẽn pa tar bũmb ning sẽn tõe n yã wã pʋga. A lebga Kerala tẽnga yiib-n-soabã sẽn lebg nin-buiidã n yaool n lebg nin-kãensã. [1]

... 
ã n kẽng Kali. Sẽn na yɩl n maan Mudiyettu tʋʋm sõma, b segd n sõoga neb 16 sẽn na n yɩɩdã, tɩ b tar b sẽn na n maan yɩɩl-dãmb la b sẽn na yɩl n tõog n yɩɩl-a.[2]Sẽn paase, b pa mi a Mudiyettu sẽn da tar futu la a sẽn maand to-to wã ye. Woto, a Koratty wã pʋgẽ, a Kali tara a gãag sẽn yaa zaalem, a sẽn teeg a gãagã bal n zĩndi. Woto me, a Koratty modẽ wã pʋgẽ, a Darika mudi wã wõnda Kathakali naam-wʋnda, la a nengã me yaa Kathakali Kathi Veshas wã. Woto wilgdame tɩ b sẽn da tar b toorẽ wã yaa too

in-kãensã ye, la b sẽn na n kell n vɩɩmd wakat sẽn kõn sa wã fãa bee ne tẽnsã sẽn na n tall n tɩ taas ne a Guru-Shishya Parampara wã ye.[4]

A Zeezi sẽn pʋʋs yʋng tõre, tɩ vẽkembeoogã t’a yãk karen-biis 12 tɩ b lebg a tʋm-tʋmdbã, tõe t’a yaame. Baasgo, a sẽn dat n sõng nebã yĩnga, a paama pãng n zãms-b Wẽnnaam goamã. Yɩɩ Galɩle tãng a ye zug la a zĩnd n sõs tɩ b kelge. Tõe tɩ pa zãr ne Kapɛrnawom sẽn yaa zĩig ning a sẽn zĩnd n yɩɩdã ye.
Neb kʋʋng n yi zĩ-zãrs n wa a Zeezi nengẽ. Kẽer yii goabg babgã, wala makre Zeruzalɛm la Zʋʋde tẽns a taaba, tɩ sãnda yi Tɩɩr ne Sɩdõ sẽn pẽ mogrã n be rɩtg babgã. Bõe yĩng tɩ b wa a Zeezi nengẽ? Yaa 
... 
ba sẽn be arzãnã kamba. Bala, bãmb kɩtdame tɩ bãmb wĩntoogã zẽkd nins-wẽnse, la nin-sõamyã yĩnga.”—Matye 5:44, 45.
A Zeezi kʋmsa a gom-kãensã n yeele: “Dẽ yĩnga, bɩ yãmb yɩ neb sẽn zems zãnga, a wa yãmb ba sẽn be arzãnã sẽn zems zãngã.” (Matye 5:48) Yaa vẽeneg t’a ra pa rat n yeel tɩ ninsaal tõe n sɩd zemsa zãng ye. La d sã n modgd n dɩkd Wẽnnaam togs-n-taare, d na n tõog n nonga baa d bɛɛbã menga. A Zeezi pʋd n yeelame: “Bɩ y yɩ nimbãan-zoɛtba, wa yãmb ba wã sẽn yaa nimbãan-zoɛtã.”—Luk 6:36.
PƲ
...
tuu bog-zulunga, n yẽbg roogã kugr zugu.” (Luk 6:48) D sã n paam n wʋm a Zeezi goamã, rẽ bal pa sek ye. D segd n modgame ‘n tũ.’
La ned ning “sẽn wʋmd goam” nins a Zeezi sẽn togsã, “n ka sakdẽ” wã yẽ? A soab yaa “wa yalem sẽn me a roog bĩisr zugu.” (Matye 7:26) Saagã sã n ni tɩ koomã zoe, tɩ sebgã fugi, ro-kãng na n lʋɩɩme.
A Zeezi sẽn sagl kʋʋngã to-to tãngã zugã ling-b lame. Ra yaa vẽeneg t’a tara nebã zãmsg tõogo. Ra pa wõnd tũudmã taoor dãmb ye. Neb wʋsg sẽn kelg-a sak n lebga a karen-biisi.

1Na'ayenɛ n de mam soka zen'an. Bene n sɔe te ho yele mam yeti, Peɛn ana wo niiŋa ɛngera ho zoore wa zuo. 2Behɛ nɛrebe'ero la pon maahom ba tiini me. Ba pon ve'e ba ba pɛɛma mɛ, maahom te ba tɛn' nɛresɛba n de tontɔɔdoma la. 3Ba han sagom ɛnbera wa ba'ahɛ, nɛresɛba n de tontɔɔdoma la wan eŋɛ la wane? 4Na'ayenɛ boe la a Toolom Yire la poan. Na'ayenɛ zin' la a saazuo na'am koka na. A behere nyɛta nɛresaala woo mɛ. A mɛŋa nini n behere ba. 5Na'ayenɛ behere la sɛba n de tontɔɔdoma. Ge Na'ayenɛ yaɛ yelebe'eteba la sɛba n nɔŋɛ gbirigere. 6Na'ayenɛ tare la kuga n taɛ bugum niira bahera yelebe'eteba la zuo. Sɛla woo te ba eta kan bo ba nyonrɔ. 7Se'ere n sɔe la, Na'ayenɛ n dela tontɔɔdaana. A nɔŋɛ la yelemɛŋɛrɛ. Nɛresɛba n ze' tontɔɔ ma'an n wan nyɛ a nɛŋa.

Yãmb nonga pʋʋsg bɩ? Neb wʋsg pʋʋsdame. Baa neb sẽn pa tẽed Wẽnde. La bõe yĩng tɩ nebã pʋʋsdẽ? Vaeesg b sẽn maan Fãrens soolmẽ wã wilgame tɩ b nin-buiidã pʋɩ-sʋk pʋʋsdame wall b mi n tagsd Wẽnnaam yelle, la yaa “sẽn na yɩl tɩ b yam gãand bãan” bala. Wala Erop soolmã neb wʋsgo, Fãrens nin-buiidã kẽer sẽn pʋʋsdã pa sẽn na yɩl n pẽg Wẽnnaam ye. Tẽns a taab pʋsẽ me, sãnda sẽn yet tɩ b tẽeda Wẽnnaam pʋʋsd-a-la b sã n wa tar zu-loees bala, n dat sõngr tao-tao.—Ezai 26:16.
La yãmb yẽ? Rẽ yĩnga y tagsdame tɩ pʋʋsgã yõod yaa sõng-d tɩ d yam gãand bãan bɩ? Yãmb sã n tẽeda Wẽnnaam, rẽ yĩnga y neeme tɩ y sẽn pʋʋsdã nafd-y lame bɩ? Bɩ wõnda Wẽnnaam pa reegd y pʋʋsgo? Biiblã tõe n sõng-y lame tɩ y bãng tɩ pʋʋsgã yõod pa sõng ned t’a yam gãand bãan ye. Yaa sẽn na yɩl t’a paam Wẽnnaam zoodo.

Wẽnnaam sẽn belsd sũ-sãoong rãmbã, b belsa tõndo.—2 KORẼNT DÃMBA 7:6.
NEB KẼER SẼN MAAND SÃMBSÃ VÕORE: Baa sãnda sẽn mi n paam zu-loees tɩ b sũur sãam wʋsg tɩ b rat belsgã, b baas n getame tɩ pa zems tɩ b kos Wẽnnaam sõngr ye. Ad pag a ye yʋʋr sẽn boond t’a Raquel sẽn yeele: “Mam sã n ges dũniyã nebã sõor sẽn waoog to-to wã, la ned fãa zu-loees sẽn kɛgmã, wõnda mam zu-loeesã paooda wʋsgo, tɩ m yam-yood ne m na kos Wẽnnaam sõngre.”
WẼNNAAM GOMDÃ SẼN YETE: Wẽnnaam zoe n maana bũmb sẽn yaa kãsenga,
... 
m nonga tõndo, n tʋm bãmb Biig a Zezi Kirist t’a yɩ maoong tõnd yel-wẽnã yĩnga. (1 Zã 4:10) Ne a Zezi kũumã sẽn yɩ maoongã maasem, Wẽnnaam sõng-d lame tɩ d tõe n paam d yel-wẽnã sugri, sũur-kaset sẽn pa ningd-d taale, la d tõe n tẽ tɩ d na n wa paam n vɩɩmda wakat sẽn kõn sa, dũni-paalg pʋgẽ laafɩ sẽn na n zĩndi. * La rẽ yĩnga Wẽnnaam sẽn maan maoon-kãngã wã wilgdame tɩ yãmb mengã yell pak-a lame bɩ, bɩ yaa sẽn na n wilg bal t’a nonga ãdem-biisã fãa?
D gom tʋm-tʋmd a Poll yelle. A sũur yɩɩ noog 
...
(Galat dãmba 2:20) A Zezi kiime t’a Poll yaool n na n lebg kiris-neda. La baasgo, a yeelame t’a Zezi kii yẽ yĩnga.
Wẽnnaam sẽn sak t’a Zezi ki tɩ yɩ maoongã yaa yãmb me yĩnga. Woto wilgdame tɩ yãmb tara yõod wʋsg Wẽnnaam nifẽ. Maoon-kãngã tõe n kõo yãmb “belsg sẽn ka sɛta, la tẽeb pidsg gũudum,” tɩ “yãmb kɩ yẽg tʋʋm-sõma la gom-sõma fãa pʋgẽ.”—2 Tesalonik rãmba 2:16, 17.
La yaa na maan yʋʋm 2000 masã la a Zezi sẽn ki tɩ yɩ maoongã. Rẽ wã, bõe n wilgd tɩ Wẽnnaam ket n datame tɩ yãmb paam a zoodo.

GŨUSG GASGÃ
Sokre: Malɛgsã sɩd beeme bɩ?
Vɛrse: Yɩɩn. 103:20
Sebrã kãabgo: Seb-kãngã pʋgẽ, b wilgda Biiblã sẽn yet malɛgsã wɛɛngẽ la b sẽn maande.
D WILG NEBÃ BŨMB BIIBLÃ SẼN YETE
Sokre: Yãmb tagsdame tɩ siãnsã ne Biiblã sẽn yetã kɩɩsda taab bɩ?
Vɛrse: Eza. 40:22
Biiblã sẽn yete: Biiblã sã n wa gomd siãnsã yelle, a sẽn yetã yaa kɛpɩ.
D BOOND-Y LAME TƖ Y WA TIGISGA (inv)

Israyɛll nebã sẽn pasg mog-miuugã, kiis a yiib poore b taa Sinayi tãngẽ wã. Beenẽ, a Zeova maana kaool ne-ba, tɩ b lebg neb yẽ sẽn yãk tɩ b yaa toore. A kogl-b lame, la a kõ-b bũmb nins fãa b sẽn da ratã. A kõ-b-la rɩɩb b sẽn boond tɩ mande, n kõ-b fut sẽn pa sãamde, la a wilg-b zĩis b sẽn tõe n tilg b fu-rotã tɩ bũmb pa maan-b ye. Yãmb sã n yaa roagda, sõng-y y biigã t’a bãng bũmb ning sẽn kɩt t’a Zeova kõ Israyɛll nebã tõogã, sɛk-roogã, la maan-kʋʋdbã. Wilg-y-yã-a tɩ d segd n maana wa d sẽn yeele, tɩ d segd n yɩɩ sik-m-mens rãmba, la d sak a Zeova wakat fãa.

Moutya yaa Afirik kʋdemd sẽn wõnd Sega wã, la a sẽn tar n paasd a sẽn dat n wilg bũmb ningã. Pagbã la b ra-rãmb sẽn ki wã kẽndda ne b sẽn maand n pa tar b sẽn tõe n yã wã n wa paam n yãgd n yãgd b sẽn maand ne bʋʋg pe-kẽeng n wa n wa n dɩt n wa n kʋɩɩb-b n wa n sɩng kibsã (n yaool n yaa yʋngo). Dãnd sɩngda bilf-bilf wakat ning b sẽn boond tɩ bobã sẽn paẽ wã, la a paasda a pãng n lebg a sẽn yaa a sẽn na yɩl n maan bũmb sẽn pa noom nebã, a sẽn na n yɩ tao-tao n paasdẽ wã yĩnga.
B sẽn yãgd yɩɩlã, b sẽn kiidã, b yɩɩla yɩɩl sẽn wilgdẽ tɩ b vɩɩndã pʋgẽ, b sũ-sãamsã la sũ-noogã yaa to-to. Hal tɩ ta yʋʋm 1970 wã saabẽ, b ra getame tɩ Moutya wã yaa yɩɩl sẽn yaa sõma n yɩɩd, la b pa sak-a ye.

Yaa ne Biiblã maasem la Wẽnnaam gomd ne tõndo. 2 Tɩmote 3:16
Wẽnnaam kɩtame tɩ neb gʋls a raabã tɩ be sebr pʋgẽ. B boonda seb-kãng tɩ Biible. A pʋgẽ wã, y yãta bũmb wʋsg sẽn tar yõodo, tɩ dat tɩ y bãnge.
Wẽnnaam mii bũmb nins sẽn yaa sõma ne tõndã. Y sã n kelg-a, y na n paama yam hakɩka.—Yelbũna 1:5.
Wẽnnaam datame tɩ nebã fãa karem Biiblã. A bee ne buud-goam wʋsgo.
Y sã n dat n kelg Wẽnnaam, y segd n karma Biiblã, la y bao n wʋm a goamã võore.
Zĩig fãa, neb n zãmsd Biiblã n bãngd Wẽnnaam. Matɩe 28:19
A Zeova Kaset rãmbã tõe n sõng-y lame tɩ y wʋm Biiblã goam võore.
Dũniyã gill zugu, b zãmsda neb Biiblã tɩ b bãngd Wẽnnaam.
Zãmsgã pa yaood ye. Y tõeeme me n kẽnd a Zeova Kaset rãmbã Rĩung Roogẽ n kelgd sõss sẽn na n sõng-y tɩ y bãng Wẽnnaam.

La Biiblã pʋgẽ, b pa yet t’a Bɛlsazaar zĩndame bal ye. B paasame t’a yɩɩ rĩma. Neb n da yet tɩ rẽ me pa sɩd ye. Wala makre, yʋʋmd 1875 wã sẽnese, a William Talbot sẽn yaa siãnsã bãngd a ye wã yeela a sebr pʋgẽ yaa: “Neb n yet t’a ‘Bel-sar-ussur [Belshazzar] rɩɩ naam wakat-yɛng ne a Naboniid sẽn yaa a ba wã.’ La bũmb yaool n kae n wilgd rẽ vẽeneg ye.”

Yaa vẽeneg tɩ sã n yaa ne sẽn tũud-b a Zeova wã, yaa Biiblã meng n kõt kaset n tɩ yɩɩd tɩ d tõe n kɩsa sɩd ne goam nins sẽn be Dãniyɛll sebrã pʋgẽ wã, la tɩ sɩd yaa Wẽnnaam n vẽneg tɩ b gʋlse.—2 Tɩm. 3:16.

A ZOZƐF SẼN YIT ARIMATE wã pa mi a sẽn maan to-to n paam raood n tɩ gom ne Rom guvɛrneer a Põos Pɩlat ye. A Pɩlat ra maanda a sẽn date, tɩ ned pa tõe t’a toeem yam ye. La sẽn na yɩl tɩ b paam n mum a Zeezi wa sẽn segde, yaa tɩlɛ tɩ ned tɩ kos a Pɩlat sor n dɩk a kũumã. A Zozɛf sẽn tɩ gom ne a Pɩlatã, a sakame. Tõe t’a ra tẽedame tɩ na n yɩɩ toogo, la pa yɩ woto ye. A Pɩlat sokame n ges a Zeezi sã n zoe n kiime, tɩ b yeel t’a kiime. Rẽ poore, a yeela a Zozɛf t’a tõe n dɩka kũumã. Baa ne sũ-sãangã

A Zeezi kũumã wakatã t’a Zozɛf tara raood masã. A pa le zoet rabeem, n pa rat n maan tɩ b bãng t’a yaa a Zeezi karen-biig ye. Mark 15:43 wilgda rẽ. Be, b yeelame: ‘Yẽnda maana raood n kẽng a Pɩlat nengẽ n tɩ kos a Zeezi kũumã.’

A Zozɛf kibarã segd n kɩtame tɩ ned kam fãa sok a meng yaa: Rẽ yĩnga bũmb n be m sẽn nand n yɩɩd m sẽn paam n tar zood ne a Zeova wã bɩ? Wala makre, ziir bɩ naam, tʋʋmde, tarem, lohorem wall m zakã rãmb sũ-noogo.

“Wẽnnaam na n zẽka b no-rɛɛs a yembr sẽn yaa wa maam yãmb buuda sʋka. Bɩ y kelg bũmb nins fãa a sẽn na n togs yãmbã.”—TƲƲ. 3:22.

A Joseph Cudjoe yaa Ghana politik soab la Ghana Republic a naase, a yaa tẽnga member of Parliament. A yaa New Patriotic Party nin-buiida.[1]
B roga a Cudjoe yʋʋmd 1964 zĩ-likr rasem a yiib daare. A yita Effia, sẽn yaa tẽng sẽn be Ghana western region. A paama a Bachelor of Science degree mathematics pʋgẽ a Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology, Kumasi la a MBA Finance wɛɛngẽ University of Ghana.[1][2][3]
A Joseph Cudjoe sɩnga a tʋʋmda wa mathematics karen-saamb Archbishop Porter Girls Secondary School pʋgẽ yʋʋmd 1995 yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug n tãag yʋʋmd 1995 yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuugã. A Cudjoe tʋma wa karen-saamb Takoradi Technical University pʋgẽ yʋʋmd 1995 n tãag 2000. Rẽ poore, a kẽnga Eno International, LLC, a sẽn wa n tʋmd wa Financial Analysis & Planning Manager yʋʋmd 2000 n tãag 2001. A lebga a SEM International Associates Senior Consultant yʋʋmd 2002 tʋʋl-nif kiuug rasem a yi, n yaool n lebg a SEM International LTD general manager yʋʋmd 2003 sɩpaolg kiuug tʋʋl-nif kiuug rasem a yi. Yʋʋmd 2004 tʋʋl-nif kiuug n tãag yʋʋm 2012 yʋʋm tus a yi, a Cudjoe yɩɩ Ghana Cocoa Board Investment Manager.[1][2][3]
A Cudjoe kẽe parliament wã yʋʋmd 2013 yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug rasem a 7 n na n yɩ Effia constituency, a sẽn yaa New Patriotic Party sullã taoor soaba. A le paama yãkr n na n yɩ tẽnga taoor soab yʋʋm 2016.[1][2][3]
A Cudjoe kẽe kãadem la a tara kamb a tãabo. A wilgame t'a yaa kiris-neda.[1][2][3]
